content.query:
-- Using T-SQL Predict command to score machine learning models. 
SELECT *
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM load.test_model_03022022 WHERE [ID] = 'uiap-azure-ml-ws-fraud-detection-model-Best:3'),
              DATA =[dbo].[claims_summary_modelInput_03022022],
              RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([label_out] [bigint]) where label_out=1
